user_input_variations: What is the price of the Flow Sensor?
Tell me about the Flow Sensor.
What material is the Flow Sensor made of?
responses: The Flow Sensor is priced at ₹4,448.60 inc GST. It is made of plastic and is connected to the motor pump and tubes to measure the flow rate.
The Flow Sensor is a plastic device used to measure the flow rate when connected to a motor pump.

user_input_variations: What is the Hexagonal Tube Holder used for?
How much does the Hexagonal Tube Holder cost?
What material is the Hexagonal Tube Holder made of?
responses: The Hexagonal Tube Holder costs ₹236.00 inc GST and is made of plastic. It is designed to hold tubes and is lightweight with a high strength-to-weight ratio.
This holder is made from shock-resistant plastic and is used to securely hold tubes.

user_input_variations: What is the price of the 12x8mm Water Tube?
Tell me about the 12x8mm Water Tube.
What material is the 12x8mm Water Tube made of?
responses: The 12x8mm Water Tube is priced at ₹141.00 inc GST. It is made of polyethylene and is lightweight with a high strength-to-weight ratio.
This tube is thermally and electrically insulating, making it suitable for various applications.

user_input_variations: What is the price of the 3x8mm Allen Screw?
What is the usage of the 3x8mm Allen Screw?
What material is the 3x8mm Allen Screw made of?
responses: The 3x8mm Allen Screw costs ₹9.44 inc GST and is made of stainless steel. It is used in applications with insufficient clearance for a fastener with an external hexagon head.
This screw is ideal for tight spaces where traditional screws cannot be used.

user_input_variations: What is the price of the Pixhawk Cube Flight Controller?
Tell me about the Pixhawk Cube Flight Controller.
What are the specifications of the Pixhawk Cube Flight Controller?
responses: The Pixhawk Cube Flight Controller is priced at ₹41,476.50 inc GST. It features three redundant IMUs and two redundant MS5611 barometers.
This controller receives user commands and controls the motors, allowing the drone to stay airborne.

user_input_variations: What is the price of the Power Distribution Board?
What is the function of the Power Distribution Board?
Tell me about the Power Distribution Board.
responses: The Power Distribution Board costs ₹10,738.00 inc GST. It transfers power from the battery to ESCs and motors, generating power supply for the autopilot and other peripherals.
This board also provides functionality for battery voltage and current measurements.

user_input_variations: What is the price of the Motor CCW?
Tell me about the Motor CCW.
What are the specifications of the Motor CCW?
responses: The Motor CCW is priced at ₹19,942.00 inc GST. It is made of aluminum alloy and has a kv rating of 180KV with a maximum power of 770W.
This motor is used to provide the power necessary to lift the drone.

user_input_variations: What is the price of the Charger?
Tell me about the Charger.
What is the function of the Charger?
responses: The Charger costs ₹32,981.00 inc GST and is a dual-channel 6S LiPo charger for industrial application drones.
It provides balance charging for two packs of 6 cell batteries simultaneously.

user_input_vari ations: What is the price of the 6s Battery?
What are the specifications of the 6s Battery?
responses: The 6s Battery is priced at ₹32,214.00 inc GST. It has a capacity of 16,000 mAh (6S) and a voltage of 44.4 V.
This lithium polymer battery features an XT 90 connector and has a charging time of 30 to 40 minutes.

user_input_variations: What is the price of the 10L Tank?
Tell me about the 10L Tank.
What material is the 10L Tank made of?
responses: The 10L Tank costs ₹17,641.00 inc GST and is made of ABS plastic. It is designed to carry liquids such as pesticides.
This tank is lightweight and has a high strength-to-weight ratio, along with shock resistance and thermal insulation.

user_input_variations: What is the price of the Single Nozzle?
Tell me about the Single Nozzle.
What is the usage of the Single Nozzle?
responses: The Single Nozzle is priced at ₹1,840.80 inc GST. It has a maximum spray speed of 1L/min and a spray width of up to 8 acres per hour.
This nozzle is used for efficient liquid spraying applications.

user_input_variations: What is the price of the 23 inch Propeller CW?
Tell me about the 23 inch Propeller CW.
What material is the 23 inch Propeller CW made of?
responses: The 23 inch Propeller CW costs ₹2,454.40 inc GST and is made of composite carbon fiber. It is designed to be attached to the motors to lift the drone.
This propeller is essential for providing the necessary lift during flight.

user_input_variations: What is the price of the Arm Rod?
Tell me about the Arm Rod.
What material is the Arm Rod made of?
responses: The Arm Rod is priced at ₹11,505.00 inc GST and is made of aluminum. It has a tensile strength of 210 MPa.
This rod is used to connect the motor arm to the center frame, providing structural support.
